select zto.aufnr, zto.matnr, zto.maktx1, plan.plant||'('||emu.orgname||')' plant, zto.arbpl, orderbom.idnrk, orderbom.maktx2, orderbom.sortf, orderbom.lgort, sup.lifnr, case when sum(nvl(sup.car_num, 0))=0 then sum(carbom.real_num) else sum(nvl(sup.car_num, 0)) end as complete_num, sum(planbom.car_num) car_num, sup.lifnr_name, zto.kdauf, zto.KDPOS from zg_t_carbom carbom, zg_t_carplan carplan, zg_t_order zto, zg_t_orderbom orderbom, zg_t_order_planbom planbom, zg_t_carbom_suppliers sup, t_plant_enumevalue emu, zg_t_order_plan plan where plan.cuid=planbom.order_plan_id and plan.plant=emu.plantid and carbom.car_plan_id = carplan.cuid and carbom.order_id = zto.cuid and carbom.order_bom_id = orderbom.cuid and orderbom.order_id = carbom.order_id and planbom.cuid = carbom.order_planbom_id and sup.car_bom_id(+) = carbom.cuid and zto.order_state <> '-1' and carbom.storage_user_id is not null and carplan.order_plan_type <> '3' and (sup.car_num > 0 or sup.car_num is null)
group by zto.aufnr, zto.matnr, zto.maktx1, zto.plant, zto.arbpl, orderbom.idnrk, orderbom.maktx2, orderbom.sortf, orderbom.lgort, plan.plant, sup.lifnr, sup.lifnr_name,orgname, zto.kdauf,zto.KDPOS
